about.toLearnMoreVisit: To learn more about all of stretchly features and about ways how you can help it, visit it's

settings3.monitorIdleTime: monitor system idle time for natural breaks
settings3.showOnAllScreens: breaks are shown on all monitors

welcome.appDesc: Perfect app that reminds you to take breaks while working on computer.

userGuideInfo.microbreak: By default, it runs in your tray and shows reminder window every 10 minutes, that is open for 20 seconds, containing idea for microbreak.
userGuideInfo.break: Every 30 minutes, it shows window containing idea for longer 5 minute break.
userGuideInfo.notif:
User gets notified 30 seconds before breaks (and 10 seconds before microbreak) to be able to prepare to pause the work. 
You can finish break or microbreak early, by clicking the link at the bottom or by using Ctrl/Cmd + x keyboard shortcut (when not in strict mode).
userGuideInfo.tray1: You can pause/resume reminding of breaks. On Windows and macOS, you can set app to start at login.
userGuideInfo.tray2: You can also skip to the next break or microbreak anytime from menu, or reset (restart) breaks.
userGuideInfo.tray3: Tray tooltip shows information about time left till next (micro)break, number of microbreaks until next break or time left in pause till breaks resume.
userGuideInfo.setting1:
Microbreaks and breaks can be customized: 
you can set duration and interval of break 
 ou can enable/disable breaks 
you can enable/disable strict mode (breaks can't be finished early)
userGuideInfo.setting2:
you can choose from different color schemes 
you can pick a sound to be played at the end of the break
userGuideInfo.setting3:
you can set break window to be fullscreen 
you can disable showing of break ideas 
you can disable showing of break notifications 
you can disable monitoring of system idle time for natural breaks (when user leaves and after return idle time is greater then break duration, stretchly will reset breaks) 
you can disable showing breaks on all of your monitors 
you can choose language for interface
